languages.text: {n}Гемункул придирчиво оглядывает протянутый вами кусок плоти.{/n} "Необычные свойства. Ткань спонтанно мутирует и непрерывно меняет свое строение. Крайне нестабильно, опасно и непредсказуемо. Хорошая работа, образец, я заинтригован".

traits.locale_text: {n}Гемункул придирчиво оглядывает протянутый вами кусок плоти.{/n} "Необычные свойства. Ткань спонтанно мутирует и непрерывно меняет свое строение. Крайне нестабильно, опасно и непредсказуемо. Хорошая работа, образец, я заинтригован".
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}The Haemonculus meticulously inspects the piece of flesh you offered.{/n} "Unusual properties. The tissue mutates spontaneously, constantly changing its own structure. Extremely unstable, hazardous, and unpredictable. Good work, specimen. I am intrigued."
languages.original_text: {n}Гемункул придирчиво оглядывает протянутый вами кусок плоти.{/n} "Необычные свойства. Ткань спонтанно мутирует и непрерывно меняет свое строение. Крайне нестабильно, опасно и непредсказуемо. Хорошая работа, образец, я заинтригован".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus meticulously inspects the piece of flesh you are offering.{/n} "Peculiar properties. The tissue is spontaneously mutating and constantly changing its own structure. Extremely unstable, hazardous, and unpredictable. Good work, specimen. I am intrigued."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus meticulously inspects the piece of flesh you are offering.{/n} "Peculiar properties. The tissue is spontaneously mutating and constantly changing its own structure. Extremely unstable, hazardous, and unpredictable. Good work, specimen. I am intrigued."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus meticulously inspects the piece of flesh you offered.{/n} "Unusual properties. The tissue mutates spontaneously, constantly changing its own structure. Extremely unstable, hazardous, and unpredictable. Good work, specimen. I am intrigued."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}L'hémoncule inspecte méticuleusement le morceau de chair que vous lui tendez.{/n} « Il semble doté des propriétés fort inhabituelles. Le tissu mute de manière spontanée, remodelant constamment sa structure. Il est particulièrement instable, dangereux et imprévisible. Beau travail, spécimen. Je suis intrigué. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus meticulously inspects the piece of flesh you offered.{/n} "Unusual properties. The tissue mutates spontaneously, constantly changing its own structure. Extremely unstable, hazardous, and unpredictable. Good work, specimen. I am intrigued."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'hémoncule inspecte méticuleusement le morceau de chair que vous lui tendez.{/n} « Il semble doté des propriétés fort inhabituelles. Le tissu mute de manière spontanée, remodelant constamment sa structure. Il est particulièrement instable, dangereux et imprévisible. Beau travail, spécimen. Je suis intrigué. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}血伶人仔细检查你带来的肉块。{/n}“这块肉的特性不同寻常。它的组织会自发变异，不断改变自身结构，极其不稳定，充满危险、难以预测。干得漂亮，实验对象，我确实很好奇。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus meticulously inspects the piece of flesh you offered.{/n} "Unusual properties. The tissue mutates spontaneously, constantly changing its own structure. Extremely unstable, hazardous, and unpredictable. Good work, specimen. I am intrigued."

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人仔细检查你带来的肉块。{/n}“这块肉的特性不同寻常。它的组织会自发变异，不断改变自身结构，极其不稳定，充满危险、难以预测。干得漂亮，实验对象，我确实很好奇。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Der Haemonculus inspiziert das Stück Fleisch, das du ihm anbietest, sehr sorgfältig und penibel.{/n} "Ungewöhnliche Eigenschaften. Das Gewebe mutiert spontan, ändert laufend seine Struktur. Extrem instabil, gefährlich und unberechenbar. Gute Arbeit, Versuchsstück. Ich bin neugierig."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus meticulously inspects the piece of flesh you offered.{/n} "Unusual properties. The tissue mutates spontaneously, constantly changing its own structure. Extremely unstable, hazardous, and unpredictable. Good work, specimen. I am intrigued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Haemonculus inspiziert das Stück Fleisch, das du ihm anbietest, sehr sorgfältig und penibel.{/n} "Ungewöhnliche Eigenschaften. Das Gewebe mutiert spontan, ändert laufend seine Struktur. Extrem instabil, gefährlich und unberechenbar. Gute Arbeit, Versuchsstück. Ich bin neugierig."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n} El Hemónculo inspecciona el trozo de carne que le has entregado minuciosamente.{/n} «Tiene unas características insólitas: el tejido cambia de forma espontánea alterando su estructura sin cesar. Extremadamente inestable, peligroso e impredecible. Bien hecho, espécimen. Estoy intrigado».
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus meticulously inspects the piece of flesh you offered.{/n} "Unusual properties. The tissue mutates spontaneously, constantly changing its own structure. Extremely unstable, hazardous, and unpredictable. Good work, specimen. I am intrigued."

traits.locale_text: {n} El Hemónculo inspecciona el trozo de carne que le has entregado minuciosamente.{/n} «Tiene unas características insólitas: el tejido cambia de forma espontánea alterando su estructura sin cesar. Extremadamente inestable, peligroso e impredecible. Bien hecho, espécimen. Estoy intrigado».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスは、あなたが差し出した肉片を入念に調べる。{/n}「変わった性質だ。組織が自然に変異し、常に自身の構造を変化させている。極めて不安定で、危険で、予測不能だ。よくやった、標本。実に興味深い」
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus meticulously inspects the piece of flesh you offered.{/n} "Unusual properties. The tissue mutates spontaneously, constantly changing its own structure. Extremely unstable, hazardous, and unpredictable. Good work, specimen. I am intrigued."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスは、あなたが差し出した肉片を入念に調べる。{/n}「変わった性質だ。組織が自然に変異し、常に自身の構造を変化させている。極めて不安定で、危険で、予測不能だ。よくやった、標本。実に興味深い」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus, sunduğun et parçasını özenle inceliyor.{/n} "Sıra dışı niteliklere sahip. Doku; spontane olarak mutasyon geçiriyor, sürekli olarak kendi yapısını değiştiriyor. Son derece kararsız, tehlikeli ve öngörülemez. İyi iş numune. Merakımı cezbetti."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus meticulously inspects the piece of flesh you offered.{/n} "Unusual properties. The tissue mutates spontaneously, constantly changing its own structure. Extremely unstable, hazardous, and unpredictable. Good work, specimen. I am intrigued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkulus, sunduğun et parçasını özenle inceliyor.{/n} "Sıra dışı niteliklere sahip. Doku spontane olarak mutasyon geçiriyor, sürekli olarak kendi yapısını değiştiriyor. Son derece kararsız, tehlikeli ve öngörülemez. İyi iş numune. Merakımı cezbetti."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
